description: Detects execution of the Notepad++ updater in a suspicious directory, which is often used in DLL side-loading attacks Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Execution of tools named GUP.exe and located in folders different than Notepad++\updater
name: Suspicious GUP Usage
query: (process.executable:*\\GUP.exe AND (NOT (process.executable:(*\\Users\\*\\AppData\\Local\\Notepad\+\+\\updater\\GUP.exe OR *\\Users\\*\\AppData\\Roaming\\Notepad\+\+\\updater\\GUP.exe OR *\\Program\ Files\\Notepad\+\+\\updater\\GUP.exe OR *\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\Notepad\+\+\\updater\\GUP.exe))))
